hibernate-mapping.query: from StrategyImpl where name = 'SERVER'
from StrategyImpl where name = :name
select s from StrategyImpl as s where s.autoActivate = true order by s.id
from AccountImpl where name = :name
select a from AccountImpl a where a.orderServiceType = :orderServiceType
from AccountImpl where extAccount = :extAccount
select distinct sessionQualifier from AccountImpl where active = true and orderServiceType = :orderServiceType
from PositionImpl as p join fetch p.security as s join fetch s.securityFamily as f where p.id = :id
from PositionImpl as p where p.strategy.name = :strategyName order by p.id
select p from PositionImpl as p join p.strategy as s where p.security.id = :securityId and s.name = :strategyName
from PositionImpl as p where p.security.id = :securityId and p.strategy.id = :strategyId
from PositionImpl as p where p.quantity != 0 order by p.security.id

select new Position(sum(t.quantity), t.security) from TransactionImpl as t where t.security != null and t.dateTime <= :maxDate group by t.security.id having sum(t.quantity) != 0 order by t.security.id
from PositionImpl as p where p.strategy.name = :strategyName and p.quantity != 0 order by p.security.id

select new Position(sum(t.quantity), t.strategy, t.security) from TransactionImpl as t where t.security != null and t.dateTime <= :maxDate and t.strategy.name = :strategyName group by t.security.id having sum(t.quantity) != 0 order by t.security.id
select p from PositionImpl as p join p.security as s where p.strategy.name = :strategyName and p.quantity != 0 and s.class = :type order by p.security.id

select p from PositionImpl as p join p.security as s join s.securityFamily as sf join sf.underlying as u where p.strategy.name = :strategyName and p.quantity != 0 and s.class = :type and u.class = :underlyingType order by p.security.id
from PositionImpl as p where p.strategy.name = :strategyName and p.quantity != 0 and p.security.securityFamily.id = :securityFamilyId order by p.security.id
from PositionImpl as p where p.quantity != 0 and p.security.underlying.id = :underlyingId order by p.security.id
from PositionImpl as p where p.security.id = :securityId and p.quantity != 0 order by p.id
select p from PositionImpl as p join p.security.securityFamily as f where p.quantity != 0 and f.tradeable = true order by p.security.id

select new Position(sum(p.quantity), sum(p.cost), p.security) from PositionImpl as p join p.security.securityFamily as f where f.tradeable = true group by p.security.id having sum(p.quantity) != 0 order by p.security.id
from PositionImpl as p where p.strategy.name = :strategyName and p.quantity != 0 and p.security.securityFamily.tradeable = true order by p.security.id
select p from PositionImpl as p join p.security as s where p.quantity != 0 and s.class = ForexImpl order by p.security.id

select new Position(sum(p.quantity), sum(p.cost), p.security) from PositionImpl as p join p.security as s where s.class = ForexImpl group by p.security.id having sum(p.quantity) != 0 order by p.security.id
select p from PositionImpl as p join p.security as s where p.strategy.name = :strategyName and p.quantity != 0 and s.class = ForexImpl order by p.security.id
select p from ExpirableI as e join e.positions as p where p.quantity != 0 and e.expiration <= :currentTime
from PositionImpl where persistent = true
from PositionImpl where persistent = false
select new Position(sum(p.quantity), sum(p.cost), p.security) from PositionImpl as p group by p.security.id having sum(p.quantity) != 0 order by p.security.id
from SubscriptionImpl where strategy.name = :strategyName order by security.id
from SubscriptionImpl as s left outer join fetch s.props as p where s.strategy.name = :strategyName order by s.security.id
from SubscriptionImpl where strategy.name = :strategyName and security.id = :securityId
from SubscriptionImpl where strategy.name = :strategyName and security.id = :securityId and feedType = :feedType
from SubscriptionImpl as s where s.strategy.autoActivate = true and s.security.id = :securityId and s.feedType = :feedType order by s.id
from SubscriptionImpl where persistent = false
from SubscriptionImpl as s where s.strategy.name = :strategyName and s.security not in (select p.security from PositionImpl as p where p.strategy.name = :strategyName and p.quantity != 0)

select s2 from SubscriptionImpl as s2 join s2.security as s where s2.strategy.name = :strategyName and s not in (select p.security from PositionImpl as p where p.strategy.name = :strategyName and p.quantity != 0) and s.class = :type
from SubscriptionImpl as su join fetch su.security as s where su.strategy.autoActivate = true order by s.id, su.feedType
from TransactionImpl as t where t.strategy.name = :strategyName order by t.id
from TransactionImpl as t join fetch t.strategy join fetch t.security as s join fetch s.securityFamily left join fetch t.account where t.dateTime >= :curdate order by t.dateTime desc

from TransactionImpl as t join fetch t.strategy join fetch t.security as s join fetch s.securityFamily left join fetch t.account where t.strategy.name = :strategyName and t.dateTime >= :curdate order by t.dateTime desc
from TransactionImpl as t join fetch t.security where t.type = 'BUY' or t.type = 'SELL' or t.type = 'EXPIRATION' or t.type = 'TRANSFER' order by t.dateTime

from TransactionImpl as t where (t.type = 'CREDIT' or t.type = 'DEBIT' or t.type = 'INTREST_PAID' or t.type = 'INTREST_RECEIVED' or t.type = 'DIVIDEND' or t.type = 'FEES' or t.type = 'REFUND' or t.type = 'REBALANCE') and t.strategy.name = :strategyName and t.dateTime > :minDate order by t.dateTime
from TransactionImpl as t where t.dateTime <= :maxDate order by t.dateTime
from TransactionImpl as t where t.strategy.name = :strategyName and t.dateTime <= :maxDate order by t.dateTime
from TransactionImpl as t where t.dateTime > :minDate and t.dateTime < :maxDate and (t.type = 'BUY' or t.type = 'SELL') order by t.dateTime
from TransactionImpl as t where t.extId = :extId
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select cast(right(UUID_SHORT(),9) as unsigned) as id, t.security_fk, date(t.date_time) as date_time, 'DAY_1' as bar_size, cast(substring_index(group_concat((case f.tradeable when true then (t.bid + t.ask) / 2 else t.last end) order by t. date_time),',',1) as decimal (12,5)) as open, max(case f.tradeable when true then (t.bid + t.ask) / 2 else t.last end) as high, min(case f.tradeable when true then (t.bid + t.ask) / 2 else t.last end) as low, cast(substring_index(group_concat((case f.tradeable when true then (t.bid + t.ask) / 2 else t.last end) order by t.date_time desc),',',1) as decimal (12,5)) as close, sum(t.vol) as vol, 0 as open_intrest, 0 as settlement from tick as t join security as s on t.security_fk = s.id join security_family as f on s.security_family_fk = f.id where t.security_fk = :securityId and date_time >= :minDate and date_time <= :maxDate group by t.security_fk, date(t.date_time)
hibernate-mapping.query: from BarImpl where security.id = :securityId and barSize = :barSize order by dateTime desc
from BarImpl where security.id = :securityId and barSize = :barSize and dateTime >= :minDate order by dateTime desc
select b from BarImpl as b join fetch b.security join b.security.subscriptions as s where s != null and b.dateTime >= :minDate and b.dateTime < :maxDate and b.barSize = :barSize order by b.dateTime
from TickImpl as s where s.security.id = :securityId order by s.dateTime
from TickImpl as t where t.security.id = :securityId and t.dateTime >= :minDate and t.dateTime < :maxDate order by t.dateTime asc
from TickImpl as t where t.security.id = :securityId and t.dateTime <= :maxDate and t.dateTime > :minDate order by t.dateTime desc
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select t1.id from tick as t1 join (select max(id) as id from tick where security_fk = :securityId and time(date_time) <= time(:time) group by date(date_time)) as t2 on t1.id = t2.id order by t1.date_time asc

select t1.id from tick as t1 join (select min(id) as id from tick where security_fk = :securityId and time(date_time) >= time(:time) group by date(date_time) ) as t2 on t1.id = t2.id order by t1.date_time asc

select t1.id from tick as t1 join (select max(id) as id from tick where security_fk = :securityId and MINUTE(date_time) <= :minutes and date_time >= :minDate group by DATE_FORMAT(date_time, '%Y-%m-%d-%H') ) as t2 on t1.id = t2.id order by t1.date_time asc

select t1.id from tick as t1 join (select min(id) as id from tick where security_fk = :securityId and MINUTE(date_time) >= :minutes and date_time >= :minDate group by DATE_FORMAT(date_time, '%Y-%m-%d-%H')) as t2 on t1.id = t2.id order by t1.date_time asc
hibernate-mapping.query: from TickImpl as t left join fetch t.security as s left join fetch s.underlying as ul where t.id in (:ids) order by t.dateTime asc
select t from TickImpl as t join t.security.subscriptions as s where s != null and t.dateTime >= :minDate and t.dateTime < :maxDate order by t.dateTime
from PropertyImpl where persistent = false
select distinct c from CombinationImpl as c join c.subscriptions as s where s.strategy.name = :strategyName
select distinct c from CombinationImpl as c join c.underlying as ul join c.subscriptions as s where s.strategy.name = :strategyName and ul.id = :underlyingId
select distinct s from CombinationImpl as s join s.components as c join s.subscriptions as su where su.strategy.name = :strategyName and c.security.id = :securityId
select distinct s from CombinationImpl as s join s.components as c join s.subscriptions as su join c.security as se where su.strategy.name = :strategyName and se.class = :type
select distinct s from CombinationImpl as s join s.components as c join s.subscriptions as su join c.security as se where su.strategy.name = :strategyName and se.class = :type and c.quantity = 0
from CombinationImpl where persistent = false
select distinct c from ComponentImpl as c join fetch c.security as s join fetch c.combination as c2 join c2.subscriptions as su where su.strategy.name = :strategyName
select distinct c from ComponentImpl as c join fetch c.security as s join fetch c.combination as c2 join c2.subscriptions as su where su != null and s.id = :securityId
select distinct c from ComponentImpl as c join fetch c.security as s join fetch c.combination as c2 join c2.subscriptions as su where su.strategy.name = :strategyName and s.id = :securityId
from ComponentImpl where persistent = false
from EasyToBorrowImpl where date = :date and broker = :broker
from ForexImpl as f join fetch f.securityFamily where f.baseCurrency = :baseCurrency and f.securityFamily.currency = :transactionCurrency
from FutureImpl f join fetch f.securityFamily where f.securityFamily.id = :futureFamilyId and f.expiration = :expirationDate
select f from FutureImpl as f where f.securityFamily.id = :futureFamilyId and f.expiration >= :targetExpirationDate order by f.expiration asc
select distinct f from FutureImpl as f join f.subscriptions as s where s != null order by f.id
select f from FutureImpl as f join f.securityFamily as sf where sf.id = :securityFamilyId
from FutureImpl f where f.securityFamily.id = :futureFamilyId and f.monthYear = :monthYear
from FutureFamilyImpl as f where f.underlying.id = :underlyingId
from IntrestRateImpl as i where i.securityFamily.currency = :currency and i.duration =:duration
from OptionImpl as so where so.underlying.id = :underlyingId and so.expiration >= :targetExpirationDate and so.type = :optionType order by so.expiration asc, abs(:underlyingSpot - so.strike) asc

from OptionImpl as so where so.underlying.id = :underlyingId and so.expiration >= :targetExpirationDate and so.type = :optionType and (case so.type when 'PUT' then so.strike else -so.strike end) <= (case so.type when 'PUT' then 1.0 else -1.0 end) * :underlyingSpot order by so.expiration asc, (case so.type when 'PUT' then -so.strike else so.strike end) asc

select so from OptionImpl as so, TickImpl as t where so.id = t.security.id and so.underlying.id = :underlyingId and so.expiration >= :targetExpirationDate and so.type = :optionType and t.dateTime = :date order by so.expiration asc, abs(:underlyingSpot - so.strike) asc

select so from OptionImpl as so, TickImpl as t where so.id = t.security.id and so.underlying.id = :underlyingId and so.expiration >= :targetExpirationDate and so.type = :optionType and t.dateTime = :date and (case so.type when 'PUT' then so.strike else -so.strike end) <= (case so.type when 'PUT' then 1.0 else -1.0 end) * :underlyingSpot order by so.expiration asc, (case so.type when 'PUT' then -so.strike else so.strike end) asc
select distinct s from OptionImpl as s join s.subscriptions as s2 where s2 != null order by s.id
select s from OptionImpl as s join s.securityFamily as sf where sf.id = :securityFamilyId
select distinct s.expiration from TickImpl as t join t.security as s where t.dateTime = :dateTime and s.class = OptionImpl and s.underlying.id = :underlyingId order by s.expiration
from OptionImpl o where o.securityFamily.id = :optionFamilyId and o.expiration = :expirationDate and o.strike = :strike and o.type = :type
from OptionFamilyImpl as f where f.underlying.id = :underlyingId
from SecurityImpl as s where s.id in (:ids) order by s.id
from SecurityImpl as s where s.symbol = :symbol
from SecurityImpl as s where s.isin = :isin
from SecurityImpl as s where s.bbgid = :bbgid
from SecurityImpl as s where s.ric = :ric
from SecurityImpl as s where s.conid = :conid
from SecurityImpl as s where s.lmaxid = :lmaxid
from SecurityImpl as s where s.ttid = :ttid
from SecurityImpl as s left join fetch s.underlying as ul join fetch s.securityFamily as f left join fetch f.exchange where s.id = :id
select distinct s from SecurityImpl as s join s.subscriptions as su where su.strategy.autoActivate = true order by s.id
select distinct s from SecurityImpl as s join fetch s.securityFamily as f join s.subscriptions as su where su.strategy.autoActivate = true and su.feedType = :feedType order by s.id
select distinct s from SecurityImpl as s join fetch s.securityFamily as f join s.subscriptions as su where su.strategy.name = :strategyName and su.feedType = :feedType order by s.id
select s.id from SecurityImpl as s where s.isin = :isin
from SecurityImpl as s left join fetch s.underlying as ul join fetch s.securityFamily as f left join fetch f.brokerParameters as bp left join fetch f.exchange as ex where s.id = :id
from SecurityFamilyImpl as sf where sf.name = :name
from SecurityReferenceImpl as sr join fetch sr.target as target join fetch target.securityFamily where sr.owner.id = :ownerSecurityId and sr.name = :name
from StockImpl where gics like concat(:code, '______')
from StockImpl where gics like concat(:code, '____')
from StockImpl where gics like concat(:code, '__')
from StockImpl where gics = :code
select s from StockImpl as s join s.securityFamily as sf where sf.id = :securityFamilyId
from ExchangeImpl as e where e.name = :name
from CashBalanceImpl as c where c.strategy.name = :strategyName
from CashBalanceImpl where currency = :currency and strategy = :strategy
from CashBalanceImpl where currency = :currency and strategy = :strategy
select distinct c.currency from CashBalanceImpl as c
select distinct c.currency from CashBalanceImpl as c left join c.strategy as s where s.name = :strategyName
from MeasurementImpl as m where m.strategy.name = :strategyName and m.name = :name and m.dateTime = :dateTime
from MeasurementImpl as m where m.strategy.name = :strategyName and m.name = :name and m.dateTime <= :maxDateTime order by m.dateTime desc
from MeasurementImpl as m where m.strategy.name = :strategyName and m.dateTime <= :maxDateTime order by m.dateTime desc
from MeasurementImpl as m where m.strategy.name = :strategyName and m.name = :name and m.dateTime >= :minDateTime order by m.dateTime
from MeasurementImpl as m where m.strategy.name = :strategyName and m.dateTime >= :minDateTime order by m.dateTime
from OrderPreferenceImpl op left outer join fetch op.defaultAccount where op.name = :name
from PortfolioValueImpl where dateTime >= :minDate and strategy.name = :strategyName order by dateTime
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select distinct cast(substring(o.int_id, length(a.`session_qualifier`) + 1) as decimal(12,0)) as order_id from `order` as o join `account` as a on (o.`account_fk` = a.`id`) where a.`session_qualifier` = :sessionQualifier order by order_id desc limit 1

select distinct cast(o.int_id as decimal(12,0)) as order_id from `order` as o join `account` as a on (o.`account_fk` = a.`id`) where a.`order_service_type` = :orderServiceType order by order_id desc limit 1
select o.id from `order` o left join order_status os2 on o.id = os2.order_fk where os2.id is null
hibernate-mapping.query: select o from OrderImpl o left outer join fetch o.orderProperties join fetch o.security s join fetch s.securityFamily sf left outer join fetch sf.brokerParameters join fetch o.strategy st left outer join fetch st.props join fetch o.account where o.id in :ids
from OrderImpl where intId = :intId
from OrderImpl o left outer join fetch o.orderProperties join fetch o.account join fetch o.strategy st where o.dateTime >= :curdate order by o.dateTime desc
from OrderImpl o left outer join fetch o.orderProperties join fetch o.account join fetch o.strategy st where o.strategy.name = :strategyName and o.dateTime >= :curdate order by o.dateTime desc
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select os.* from order_status os left join order_status os2 on (substring_index(os.int_id, '.', 1) = substring_index(os2.int_id, '.', 1) and (os.date_time < os2.date_time or (os.date_time = os2.date_time and os.sequence_number < os2.sequence_number))) where os2.id is null and (os.status = 'OPEN' or os.status = 'SUBMITTED' or os.status = 'PARTIALLY_EXECUTED')
